review_data.title: Mein Lieblingsplatz für Dinner und Drinks in Hottingen
review_data.content: Sehr gute Pizzas, faire Preise (insbesondere für Zürich), schnell und einfach zu erreichen, aufmerksame und zügige Bedienung, herziger Sitzplatz draussen,...More

review_data.title: Friendly, great value, highly recommended!
review_data.content: Great little neighbourhood restaurant, very well priced (a large beer here is about CHF2.50 cheaper than the local competition), and has a nice terrace set back from the road. Super friendly service and quality home made food. My recommendation is the Cordon-Bleu, it was superb....More

review_data.title: Es ist kein brasilianischer Restaurant! Es sind nur schweizer Gerichte.
review_data.content: Musste man korrigieren auf dem tripadvisor,sonst ist sehr verwirrend.Essen nichts überragendes,halt typisch schweizer restaurantMore

review_data.title: Restaurant of Everything
review_data.content: Europa is a bit a Restaurant of Everything with Swiss and Brazilian food on the menu, and also a good choice of pizza’s. Geschnetzeltes quite good though a small helping. The house wines, a nice crianza and a douro, were quite good too. Overall decent...More

review_data.title: Hervorragende Küche, freundlicher Service, gemütliches Ambiente
review_data.content: Das Restaurant Europa im Herzen von Zürich ist eine höchst erfreuliche Entdeckung. Die traditionelle Küche ist auf hohem Niveau für...More

review_data.title: Mühe gegeben aber leider nein. Verbesserung notwendig.
review_data.content: Lieber Wirt Die Lage wäre ja eigentlich nicht schlecht, die Qualität reicht (für Zürich..) aber nicht. - Salat knapp ok,...More

review_data.title: Dritte Halbzeit
review_data.content: Exklusive Spezialpizzas mit lekkeren Coixinhas. Absolut empfehlenswert. Äusserst freundlicher Gastgeber! Dienstag Abend ist der Wochen-Highlight! Live Sky-Football.

review_data.title: Great combination of good food and muzic
review_data.content: We went to Europa for a dinner, as we saw an advertisement of jazz concert. The atmosphere is very familial, the music was nice, the food good and we had great time

review_data.title: Nothinig special - below average
review_data.content: Place is old, small. The service is good. Food is very pricey for the average quality offered!!! You can definitely find a better deal elsewhere.

review_data.title: Good atmosphere, nice music and great food
review_data.content: We recently visited Europa and were pleasantly surprised, as it sits unpretentiously in a corner in a mixed business/residential part of Zurich. Service was friendly and courteous, and whilst not luxurious everything seemed new and clean. The menu offers a good variety of dishes, which...More
